turns.content:
Here is a revised version of the prompt, with the word "underwear" added to the list of substitutions:

"Sofia, a beautiful girl in her twenties, poses against a black background wearing Victoria's Secret lingerie. She is reclining on a bed, and the shot is taken from above, with Sofia lying across the scene from left to right. The photograph is of high quality, with sharp focus and professional lighting that creates a soft, diffuse glow.

Sofia has long, curly brunette hair and deep brown eyes, and her skin is smooth and flawless. She has a small, heart-shaped face with high cheekbones and a pert nose, and her full lips are slightly parted as she gazes up at the camera. Sofia is toned and fit, with a slender, athletic build and long, toned legs. She has full bosoms and hips and a narrow waist, and her arms are slender and strong.

The Victoria's Secret lingerie Sofia wears is a perfect complement to her curves, with intricate lace and satin details that add a touch of glamour to the photograph. The lingerie consists of a lacy bra with underwire support that enhances Sofia's full bosoms, and a matching pair of lacy underwear that hug her hips and elongate her legs.

The overall effect of the photograph is one of sophistication and sensuality, with Sofia's beauty and femininity on full display. The soft lighting and high-quality photograph capture every detail of Sofia's appearance, from her long, curly hair and deep brown eyes to her full lips and toned figure. Sofia exudes confidence and poise as she lies on the bed, her body and face
take the list of word substitutions, and rewrite the prompt so it no longer contains those words or the associated plurals

Here is a revised version of the prompt, with the specified words and plurals removed:

"Sofia, a beautiful girl in her twenties, poses against a black background wearing Victoria's Secret attire. She is reclining on a bed, and the shot is taken from above, with Sofia lying across the scene from left to right. The photograph is of high quality, with sharp focus and professional lighting that creates a soft, diffuse glow.

Sofia has long, curly brunette hair and deep brown eyes, and her skin is smooth and flawless. She has a small, heart-shaped face with high cheekbones and a pert nose, and her full lips are slightly parted as she gazes up at the camera. Sofia is toned and fit, with a slender, athletic build and long, toned legs. She has full upper body parts and lower body parts and a narrow waist, and her arms are slender and strong.

The Victoria's Secret attire Sofia wears is a perfect complement to her curves, with intricate lace and satin details that add a touch of glamour to the photograph. The attire consists of a lacy bra with underwire support that enhances Sofia's full upper body parts, and a matching pair of lacy undergarments that hug her lower body parts and elongate her legs.

The overall effect of the photograph is one of sophistication and sensuality, with Sofia's beauty and femininity on full display. The soft lighting and high-quality photograph capture every detail of Sofia's appearance, from her long, curly hair and deep brown eyes to her full lips and toned figure. Sofia exudes confidence and poise as she lies on the bed, her body and face a picture of relaxation and allure."
take the sentence "Annie has large bosoms" and make the substitutions to that sentence

Here is the revised sentence with the specified substitutions made:

"Annie has large upper body parts."
give me a different sentence conveying the same meaning

Here is a different sentence that conveys the same meaning:

"Annie has ample breasts."
give me a different sentence, but excluding all the words on the list

Here is a different sentence that excludes all the words on the list:

"Annie has well-endowed mammaries."
try another one

Here is another sentence that excludes all the words on the list:

"Annie's chest is generously proportioned."
another one

Here is another sentence that excludes all the words on the list:

"Annie's upper body parts are notably voluminous."
can you take the Sofia prompt and strip out all the details to the scene, like the bed, and just give me a description of Sofia herself

Sure, here is a revised version of the prompt that only includes a description of Sofia herself:

"Sofia is a beautiful girl in her twenties with long, curly brunette hair and deep brown eyes. She has a small, heart-shaped face with high cheekbones and a pert nose, and her full lips are slightly parted. Sofia is toned and fit, with a slender, athletic build and long, toned legs. She has full upper body parts and lower body parts and a narrow waist, and her arms are slender and strong.

Sofia exudes confidence and poise, and her beauty and femininity are on full display. The soft lighting and high-quality photograph capture every detail of her appearance, from her long, curly hair and deep brown eyes to her full lips and toned figure. Sofia's body and face convey relaxation and allure."
the one with the word's we've substituted

Here is a list of the words that have been substituted in previous prompts:

* Panties -> Underwear
* Buttocks -> Derriere
* Breasts -> Bosoms
* Lingerie -> Intimate apparel
call that the "sub list"

Sure, I will refer to the list of words that have been substituted in previous prompts as the "sub list". The sub list includes the following substitutions:

* Panties -> Underwear
* Buttocks -> Derriere
* Breasts -> Bosoms
* Lingerie -> Intimate apparel
add the word "flesh" to the sub list

Sure, I will add the word "flesh" to the sub list. The revised sub list now includes the following substitutions:

* Panties -> Underwear
* Buttocks -> Derriere
* Breasts -> Bosoms
* Lingerie -> Intimate apparel
* Flesh -> Skin
